alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 4:47PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WALTON AND WESTERN HOLMES COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM CST... At 347 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lockhart to near Wright. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Freeport, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Gaskin, Portland, Alpine Heights, Darlington, Arrant Settlement, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Glendale, Pleasant Ridge, and Center Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; South Walton
